MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san shrugged a little and smiled looking at me.

MESSAGE.JP: どういう意味合いかよくわからないけれど、とにかく僕は二人に訊ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't really understand what she was expecting of me. Anyhow, I asked them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't really understand what she was expecting of me. Anyhow, I asked them.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ジュース、どれにするか迷ってるの？」
`来ヶ谷@「それより葉留佳君が自慢のギャグを披露するらしいが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But before that, seems like Haruka-kun was going to proudly present her gag.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But before that, seems like Haruka-kun was going to proudly present her gag.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「やーっ、ちょっとー!!　姉御すとっぷー!!」
`理樹@「いや、聞こえてたけどさ…」
`三枝@「うわあっ、は、はずかしー!!」
`来ヶ谷@「まあそんな感じさ」
…とりあえずふたりの力関係はわかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was starting to get the picture of their balance of power.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was starting to get the picture of their balance of power.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて、自販機だが…正確には選んでいるところだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now, it's just a vending machine, but... We should choose something appropriate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now, it's just a vending machine, but... We should choose something appropriate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「姉御にはこれなんかどうです、コレ」
`三枝@「グリーンポーション。解毒剤みたいな色してますねスイートキャリー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Green potion. The color of sweet curry is like an antidote.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Green potion. The color of sweet curry is like an antidote.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「いい名前ですヨ。うんうん」
`来ヶ谷@「$K28青汁$K0と書いてあるように見えるが」
`三枝@「あぁ、こっちもいいかもしれないですヨっ」
`三枝@「レッドポーション。体力が回復しますねきっとっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Red potion. I'm sure it'll recover your strength.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Red potion. I'm sure it'll recover your strength.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「$K82紅生姜$K0、と書いてあるように見えるが」
`三枝@「あぁもう、姉御にはこれだ！　これがお勧め！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh geez, you should choose this, Anego! I strongly recommend it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh geez, you should choose this, Anego! I strongly recommend it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「みそかつジュース！」
ぴ。ガコン。
`三枝@「ふーっ」
三枝さんは汗を拭う仕草をする。
`三枝@「はい、姉御。献上しますヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Here, Anego. I present this to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Here, Anego. I present this to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴっ。ガコン。
`来ヶ谷@「運動後のジンジャエールは格別だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ginger ale tastes special after a good workout.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ginger ale tastes special after a good workout.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ええっ、何やってんですか姉御っ!!」
`来ヶ谷@「人に勧めるほど好きなんだろう？　自分で飲むといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You want to recommend it for others? You should drink it yourself first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You want to recommend it for others? You should drink it yourself first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「そ、そんなぁ～っ」
この人、人に言うわりに自分には洒落通じないからなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san plays tricks on people quite often, but is never the butt of them...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san plays tricks on people quite often, but is never the butt of them...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで、姉御の日って？」
`来ヶ谷@「葉留佳君が側溝に落とした硬貨を拾えなくて困っていたんだったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝The day when Haruka-kun dropped a coin in the sewage drain and was troubled over not getting it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝The day when Haruka-kun dropped a coin in the sewage drain and was troubled over not getting it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 缶に口を付けながら来ヶ谷さんは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said bringing the can to her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said bringing the can to her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「今日は姉御が私を助けてくれた日というわけなのですヨ」
`理樹@「去年の今頃の話？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mean it happened this time last year?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean it happened this time last year?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ということになるな」
`来ヶ谷@「…別に大したことはしてないのだが」
`三枝@「結構大したことでしたヨ、あれは」
`三枝@「なかなかに爽快な取り出し方でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It was quite an amazing way to get it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It was quite an amazing way to get it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「こう、がたーん、ぎゅいーん、ががががぁーっ！　…という感じで」
`理樹@（どんな取り出し方だったんだろう…）
`三枝@「そういうわけで、今日は姉御の日ー。姉御っ姉御っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝That's why today is Anego's Day. Anego, Anego.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝That's why today is Anego's Day. Anego, Anego.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「連呼しなくてもいいぞ葉留佳君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's fine even if you don't repeat my name so much, Haruka-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's fine even if you don't repeat my name so much, Haruka-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やれやれ、という感じでさらりと受け流す。
けれど言葉は柔らかい気もする。
MESSAGE.EN: But her words seemed gentle to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: But her words seemed gentle to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「つまりその件以降、三枝さんは来ヶ谷さんを姉御、と呼んでるわけなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, you started calling her Anego since then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, you started calling her Anego since then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、なんで姉御？」
`来ヶ谷@「なんで、と言われても困る。呼んでいるのは葉留佳君だしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Why are you asking me? Haruka-kun's the one calling me that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Why are you asking me? Haruka-kun's the one calling me that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ふー、みそかつジュースはシンドイですよ、姉御…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Whew, this miso cutlet juice is rough, Anego...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Whew, this miso cutlet juice is rough, Anego...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「…呼びましたか、姉御？」
`理樹@「三枝さん、どうして来ヶ谷さんを姉御って呼ぶの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Saigusa-san, why do you call Kurugaya-san Anego?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saigusa-san, why do you call Kurugaya-san Anego?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が訊ねると、三枝さんはきょとん、とした。
MESSAGE.EN: She tilted her head at my question.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tilted her head at my question.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「姉御は姉御ですヨ？」
`理樹@「いや、そうじゃなくって…いや、うん、大体言いたいことはわかる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, not exactly, um... I kinda get what you're saying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, not exactly, um... I kinda get what you're saying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに来ヶ谷さんは姉御っぽい。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san did have the air of an older sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san did have the air of an older sister.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「姉御っぽいから、姉御」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝She's like a big sister, that's why Anego.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝She's like a big sister, that's why Anego.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何か問題でも？　と三枝さんは答える。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛What's so hard to understand?❜, she seemed to be asking.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛What's so hard to understand?❜, she seemed to be asking.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「姉御を『姉貴』とか『アネさん』とか『おねいさん』とか呼んだらヘンでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It'd be just strange to call her Aneki or Anesan or Onee-san, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It'd be just strange to call her Aneki or Anesan or Onee-san, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ世にはそう呼ぶ輩もいるがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, there are some people who call me that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, there are some people who call me that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「いやいや姉御は姉御だから姉御なんですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝No, no, Anego is Anego, that's why Anego.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝No, no, Anego is Anego, that's why Anego.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ、なかなかに哲学的だな」
`理樹@「全然わからないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't get it at all though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't get it at all though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「少年、解らないから哲学なのさ。解ってしまったら哲学者はそこで廃業だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, it's philosophical so long as one doesn't understand it. It is no longer a philosophy if you understand it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, it's philosophical so long as one doesn't understand it. It is no longer a philosophy if you understand it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「世の中に完全なる解答など存在しないものなのだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝There's no such thing as a perfect answer in this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝There's no such thing as a perfect answer in this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが缶を放り投げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She tossed the juice can away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tossed the juice can away.

MESSAGE.JP: からん、と軽快な音がして空き缶はゴミ箱に吸い込まれた。
MESSAGE.EN: It landed in the garbage can with a small clank.
MESSAGE.Translation: It landed in the garbage can with a small clank.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて、と。私はそろそろ行くが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now, then. It's about time I should go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now, then. It's about time I should go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「あ、了解です。姉御。引き留めてすまんこってす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, understood. Sorry for holding you up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, understood. Sorry for holding you up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、まあ気にするな」
来ヶ谷さんは髪の毛を翻して歩き去った。
MESSAGE.EN: She flipped her hair over her shoulder and walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She flipped her hair over her shoulder and walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「一度ね」
`三枝@「姉御を『姉御』以外の呼び方をしたら怒られましたヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I called her something other than Anego, and she got angry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I called her something other than Anego, and she got angry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんはぽつり、と言葉を漏らした。
`三枝@「だから、姉御は姉御以外の姉御であるだけで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝That's why Anego is Anego, even if she isn't my Anego...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝That's why Anego is Anego, even if she isn't my Anego...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「姉御と呼ぶワケなのですな。うん」
`理樹@「…哲学的だね」
僕はさっきの来ヶ谷さんの言葉を繰り返した。確かに解答なんてなさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I repeated what Kurugaya-san said before. There certainly didn't seem to be a perfect answer to that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I repeated what Kurugaya-san said before. There certainly didn't seem to be a perfect answer to that.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ところで、理樹くん」
`理樹@「あ、うん？　何？」
`三枝@「一つお願いがあるんだけど」
`三枝@「聞いてくれる？」
`理樹@「い、いきなり何？　僕ができる範囲なら聞くけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's this all of a sudden? I'll do what I can...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's this all of a sudden? I'll do what I can...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「そろそろ私のことを名前で呼んで欲しいのですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I want you to start calling me by my name soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I want you to start calling me by my name soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　名前って…例えば？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Your name... Like what for example?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Your name... Like what for example?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「例えば、うぅむ」
三枝さんは考え込んだ。
左の指を折りながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She started counting out on the fingers of her left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started counting out on the fingers of her left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「例えば、はるちゃんとか」
`三枝@「例えば、はるちんとか」
`三枝@「例えば、はーたんとか」
`理樹@「…よー、はーたん」
`三枝@「えぇっ!?　よりによって何故それなんデスカ!?」
`理樹@「冗談だよ、冗談…でも」
`三枝@「…私のこと、名前で呼ぶのが、嫌？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...You don't want to use my name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...You don't want to use my name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも、ちょっと唐突な、とちらりとよぎった思考は、僕を覗き込む三枝さんの視線のせいで途切れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was cut off by Saigusa-san's intense glare as I was about to suggest that it was a bit too sudden.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was cut off by Saigusa-san's intense glare as I was about to suggest that it was a bit too sudden.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、いやじゃないよ。というか、三枝さんがそうしてほしいっていうなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not like I don't want to. Well, since that's what you want, Saigusa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not like I don't want to. Well, since that's what you want, Saigusa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ホントっ!?　良かった！」
三枝さんは僕の手を掴むと、ぶんぶん、と上下に振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She seized my hand and pumped it up and down.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seized my hand and pumped it up and down.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ありがとぅっ、理樹くんっ」
`理樹@「そ、それぐらい大したことじゃないよ…」
`三枝@「思い切って言って良かった。うんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'm glad I spoke my mind. Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'm glad I spoke my mind. Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんは嬉しそうだった。
`三枝@「あ、そういえば、呼び出しの時間何時だっけ…わぁ、過ぎちゃってるよーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, now that I think of it, when was I supposed to... Whoa, I'm already this late!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, now that I think of it, when was I supposed to... Whoa, I'm already this late!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「じゃ、もう行くから。ごめんねっ」
`理樹@「う、うん」
もう一度ぶんぶん、腕を振ったあと、三枝さんはぱっと、手を離して駆けだした。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook my hand one last time and suddenly broke off and dashed away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook my hand one last time and suddenly broke off and dashed away.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、ぴた、といきなり止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: But she suddenly stopped before getting too far.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she suddenly stopped before getting too far.

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「言い忘れてた。あのね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I forgot to tell you, Riki-kun, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I forgot to tell you, Riki-kun, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「名前を呼んで欲しい理由はね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝The reason I wanted you to call me by my first name is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝The reason I wanted you to call me by my first name is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「私は名字より、名前のほうが、好きだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I like it more than my last name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I like it more than my last name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「それだけの理由だからねっ」
`理樹@「そ、そうなんだ…」
`三枝@「うん。そーなのっ」
`三枝@「であ！　またねーっ」
あっという間に三枝さん、いや、葉留佳さんは校舎の角に消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the blink of an eye, Saigusa-san, no, Haruka-san rounded the corner and disappeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the blink of an eye, Saigusa-san, no, Haruka-san rounded the corner and disappeared.

MESSAGE.JP: …また戻ってきた。
`葉留佳@「忘れてた!!　はいこれ!!」
`理樹@「え」
缶ジュースをひとつ渡される。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me the juice can.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me the juice can.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやこれみそカツ…」
`葉留佳@「じゃーねーっ！」
再び校舎の角に消えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Once again she disappeared around the corner of the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once again she disappeared around the corner of the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしろっていうのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What am I supposed to do with this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What am I supposed to do with this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、すごい味だった…。
と、携帯電話で時間を確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I checked the time on my cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I checked the time on my cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 夕飯までまだ時間はあるけどどうしようかな。
MESSAGE.EN: There's still time before dinner, what to do...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's still time before dinner, what to do...

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋に戻って休んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll go back to my room and rest...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll go back to my room and rest...

MESSAGE.JP: 夕食後、僕は鈴とふたりでひとりの男子生徒の元を訪ねていた。
MESSAGE.EN: After dinner I went to look for the designated boy with Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: After dinner I went to look for the designated boy with Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が唯一知る２−Ａ組の男子生徒だ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was only one guy I knew in class 2-A.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was only one guy I knew in class 2-A.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「えーとだな…出席番号一番の男子の部屋を教えてほしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Um... Please tell us what room the guy who's first on your class attendance list lives in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Um... Please tell us what room the guy who's first on your class attendance list lives in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 心の準備をしてきただけある。知らない相手でもちゃんと目を見て話をできた。
MESSAGE.EN: She came mentally prepared, so she could even talk directly to someone she didn't know.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came mentally prepared, so she could even talk directly to someone she didn't know.

MESSAGE.JP: `男子@「一番は…相川くんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝The first one? That should be Aikawa-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝The first one? That should be Aikawa-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 知らない人相手に、僕の後ろに隠れるように立つ鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She hid behind my back, being afraid to face the stranger.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hid behind my back, being afraid to face the stranger.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕から言おうか？と訊くと、ちりんと頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked if I should do the talking, and she nodded in return.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked if I should do the talking, and she nodded in return.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「悪いけど、出席番号一番の男子の部屋を教えてくれない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, but could you tell me what room the guy who's first on your class attendance list lives in?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, but could you tell me what room the guy who's first on your class attendance list lives in?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `男子@「一番は…相川くんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝The first one? That should be Aikawa-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝The first one? That should be Aikawa-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「常に一番っぽい苗字だな、可哀相だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝His name sounds like he's always the first one on a checklist, poor thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝His name sounds like he's always the first one on a checklist, poor thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 感想だけ後ろから聞こえてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice came from behind my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice came from behind my back.

MESSAGE.JP: `男子@「角曲がって突き当たりのひとつ手前だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝Turn the corner, and you'll find his room at the end of the hall.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝Turn the corner, and you'll find his room at the end of the hall.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ありがとう、と頭を下げて、廊下を進む。
MESSAGE.EN: We bowed our thanks and headed down the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: We bowed our thanks and headed down the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: 教えてもらった部屋の前に立ち、ノックをする。
MESSAGE.EN: We stood in front of the indicated room and knocked on the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: We stood in front of the indicated room and knocked on the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `男子生徒@「はい…」
ひょろっとした男子生徒が戸口に現れる。
MESSAGE.EN: A male student appeared at the doorway.
MESSAGE.Translation: A male student appeared at the doorway.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえが相川か？」
`男子生徒@「え、はあ…」
`鈴@「話があるんだがいいか？」
`相川@「はあ、大丈夫ですけど」
`相川@「わざわざ棗さんがなんの用でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝What business could you have with me, Natsume-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝What business could you have with me, Natsume-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、あたしの知り合いだったのか？」
`相川@「いや、名前ぐらい知ってますよ」
`相川@「こっちは直枝さんですよね」
僕を見て言う。
`理樹@「ええ」
`鈴@「なんで知ってるんだ？　なんか有名人みたいだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝How did you know? It's like we're famous or something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How did you know? It's like we're famous or something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、あれだけ真人たちが騒いでたら有名にもなるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I guess we would be a bit famous, what with Masato and the rest always causing a commotion...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I guess we would be a bit famous, what with Masato and the rest always causing a commotion...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつのせいか？」
`理樹@「いや、それを蹴り倒してる鈴の行動もだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's partly because you're always kicking him down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's partly because you're always kicking him down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか…」
`鈴@「今後はなるたけ気をつけよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll be more careful from now on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll be more careful from now on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「それで、なんの用でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝So, what business do you have with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝So, what business do you have with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相川さんがそう繰り返した。
`鈴@「同じ２年だ、そう固くなるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We're both second years, don't be so stiff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We're both second years, don't be so stiff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「オッケ。で、なんの用？」
`理樹@「相川くんだよね？」
`男子生徒@「え、はあ…」
`理樹@「ちょっと話があるんだけどいい？」
`男子生徒@「はあ、大丈夫ですけど」
さてお手伝いはここまでかな。
MESSAGE.EN: All right, that should be enough help.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right, that should be enough help.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はどうぞ、とどいて鈴に続きは任せてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped back, leaving the rest to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped back, leaving the rest to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえが相川か…」
`男子生徒@「はあ…」
`鈴@「ふん…手を煩わせてくれたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Humph... You caused us quite some trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Humph... You caused us quite some trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで悪役みたいに入るの」
`理樹@「ほら、訊きたいこと訊こうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come on, you had something to ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come on, you had something to ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴なりに緊張してるのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: This was probably her way of coping with her nervousness.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was probably her way of coping with her nervousness.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「常に出席簿、一番だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're first on the attendance list, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're first on the attendance list, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「はぁ」
`相川@「…それだけを訊くために？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝...Is that all you wanted to know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝...Is that all you wanted to know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「んなわけないだろ」
鈴、これでよく嫌われないなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, it's amazing people don't hate you with that attitude.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, it's amazing people don't hate you with that attitude.

MESSAGE.JP: というか、このぶっきらぼうな態度で男子にそこそこ人気あるから、女子には結構嫌われてるんだっけか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, that brusque attitude of hers was fairly popular among the guys, while girls seemed to hate her for it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, that brusque attitude of hers was fairly popular among the guys, while girls seemed to hate her for it...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の人生は前途多難だな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin has a rocky road ahead in her life...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin has a rocky road ahead in her life...

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「わざわざ棗さんがなんの用でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝What kind of business could you have with me, Natsume-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝What kind of business could you have with me, Natsume-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、あたしの知り合いだったのか？」
`相川@「いや、名前ぐらい知ってますよ」
`相川@「こっちは直枝さんですよね」
僕を見て言う。
`理樹@「ええ」
`鈴@「そうか、なんか有名人みたいでヤだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see, it's like we're famous or something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see, it's like we're famous or something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、あれだけ真人たちが騒いでたら有名にもなるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I guess we would be a bit famous, what with Masato and the rest always causing a commotion...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I guess we would be a bit famous, what with Masato and the rest always causing a commotion...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつのせいかっ」
`理樹@「いや、それを蹴り倒してる鈴の行動もだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's partly because you're always kicking him down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's partly because you're always kicking him down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか…」
`鈴@「なら仕方がないな」
今後慎もうという選択肢はないのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Can't she simply hold back a bit from now on...
MESSAGE.Translation: Can't she simply hold back a bit from now on...

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「それで、なんの用でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝So, what business do you have with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝So, what business do you have with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相川さんがそう繰り返した。
`鈴@「同じ２年だ、そう固くなるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We're both second years, don't be so stiff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We're both second years, don't be so stiff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「オッケ。で、なんの用？」
`鈴@「なんか、むかつくな…」
`理樹@「いやいや、そんなこと口に出したらダメだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, you shouldn't talk like that when you're making your entrance...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, you shouldn't talk like that when you're making your entrance...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「とりあえず、人気のないところへいく」
相川くん（僕も柔軟に対応することにする）は一体なに？と訝しげな目をこっちに向けたが、僕は肩をすくめるしかできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Aikawa-kun stared at me with a doubtful look, unable to comprehend what was going on, but I could only shrug in return.
MESSAGE.Translation: Aikawa-kun stared at me with a doubtful look, unable to comprehend what was going on, but I could only shrug in return.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まず最初に訊きたいのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The first thing I wanted to ask is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The first thing I wanted to ask is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「うん…」
`鈴@「おまえは、今、恋患いだな。何も言うな。わかっている。裏は取れている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're lovesick right now. Don't say it. I know. I've got absolute proof.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're lovesick right now. Don't say it. I know. I've got absolute proof.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 裏なんて取れていない。
`相川@「え、誰に訊いたの!?」
`鈴@「それは内緒だ。そういう事情通がいるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's a secret. We've got a well-informed source.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's a secret. We've got a well-informed source.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫だなんて正直に答えたら突拍子すぎてそれ以上話をしてくれなくなるところを、鈴はうまくはぐらかしてみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd be insane to reveal that it's a cat, so she didn't say any more than that, deftly avoiding the question.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd be insane to reveal that it's a cat, so she didn't say any more than that, deftly avoiding the question.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「猫だ」
`理樹@「うわぁ…」
相川くんはしばらく猫、猫…と繰り返しながら考え込むが、何も思いつかなかったようだ。まさかほんとに猫だとは思うまい。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛A cat,❜ ❛a cat...❜ He was clearly thinking about it for a while, but nothing came to mind, and he couldn't possibly imagine she was really talking about a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛A cat,❜ ❛a cat...❜ He was clearly thinking about it for a while, but nothing came to mind, and he couldn't possibly imagine she was really talking about a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「で、症状はどんな感じだ」
`相川@「初恋かもしれない…胸が苦しいんだ、こんなの初めてなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝This might be my first love... My chest hurts, it's the first time I've felt something like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝This might be my first love... My chest hurts, it's the first time I've felt something like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「勉強も手につかない…授業中もずっとその人のこと考えてる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝I can't study... During classes I always think of that person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝I can't study... During classes I always think of that person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なるほど。
`鈴@「それはうまくいきそうもないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Does it look like you have a chance?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Does it look like you have a chance?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「…うん」
ちょっと間を置いてから僕らふたりに追いつめられたかのように頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: After a brief pause he nodded, as though he was really cornered.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a brief pause he nodded, as though he was really cornered.

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「相手はさ…運動も勉強もできてさ、人望もあってさ…僕なんかにはまったく釣り合わないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝You know she's... She's good both at sports and studying, and she's popular... Someone like me just doesn't belong with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝You know she's... She's good both at sports and studying, and she's popular... Someone like me just doesn't belong with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それはなんていうか…残念だったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That is, how should I put it... A shame.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That is, how should I put it... A shame.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一応言葉を選んだのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: She actually tried to find the right words...
MESSAGE.Translation: She actually tried to find the right words...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、でもまだ告白もしてないし、努力のしようがあるんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you still haven't confessed yet, couldn't you make it work with some effort?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you still haven't confessed yet, couldn't you make it work with some effort?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「果てしのない努力のような気がするなあ…」
`鈴@「おまえ弱気だな」
`鈴@「何もせずに諦めたら悔しいだろ」
`相川@「玉砕したらもっと惨めだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝I'll regret it even more if I fail...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝I'll regret it even more if I fail...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まあな」
`理樹@「どっちだよっ！」
`鈴@「なんで理樹がキレかけてるんだ？」
`鈴@「あるいは具合でも悪いのか？」
`理樹@「前者だよっ」
`鈴@「キレかけてるのか、よくわからない奴だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why are you mad, I don't get you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why are you mad, I don't get you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「横で聞いてると背中を押してるのか、思いとどませてるのかわけわかんないからだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you trying to give him a supportive push, or are you trying to make him give up, I can't tell which one it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you trying to give him a supportive push, or are you trying to make him give up, I can't tell which one it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まあ、結果がどうなるかわからないからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, it's because we can't be sure what'll happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, it's because we can't be sure what'll happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の処世術のスキルは０に等しい。
`理樹@「とりあえずもっと情報が必要なんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First of all, don't we need more information?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First of all, don't we need more information?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうだな。具体的に相手は誰なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're right. So just who is she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're right. So just who is she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉に詰まるも、鈴の目からは答えないと石にでもされるような魔力でも感じさせるのか、その口を開いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: He was at a loss for words, but probably since Rin's eyes looked like they could turn him into stone unless he answered, he blurted it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was at a loss for words, but probably since Rin's eyes looked like they could turn him into stone unless he answered, he blurted it out.

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「…笹瀬川さんです」
鈴がその名前を聞いて猫のように毛を逆立てる仕草をする。
MESSAGE.EN: As she heard the name she reacted like a cat, her hair standing on end.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she heard the name she reacted like a cat, her hair standing on end.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…なんでその名前がここででてくるんだ？」
恐る恐る訊いた。
`相川@「いや、訊かれたから」
`鈴@「いや、あいつの名前は訊いてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, I didn't ask for HER name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, I didn't ask for HER name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「いやいや、訊かれましたから…」
`鈴@「いやいやいや…」
`相川@「いやいやいやいや…」
いやいや祭りになる。
鈴は混乱している。僕がまとめるしかなさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was mired in confusion. It looks like I've got to spell it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was mired in confusion. It looks like I've got to spell it out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「つまり…」
`理樹@「相川くんの恋する相手が、鈴も知ってるその笹瀬川さんってことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aikawa-kun's in love with your pal Sasasegawa, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aikawa-kun's in love with your pal Sasasegawa, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…あーっ！」
繋がったようだ。
`鈴@「なにぃ…」
`相川@「なんで僕が親の敵みたいに睨まれてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Why are you glaring at me like I'm your family's nemesis?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Why are you glaring at me like I'm your family's nemesis?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、いろいろあるんだよ」
`相川@「うわあ、なんか猫がわらわら集まり始めてるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Whoa, what's going on? There's cats everywhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Whoa, what's going on? There's cats everywhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふかーーっ！」
`相川@「うわ、なにっ!?　何が始まるの!?」
僕は一度相川くんから引き離して、鈴と猫一同をなだめにかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I withdrew from Aikawa-kun, appeasing both Rin and the cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: I withdrew from Aikawa-kun, appeasing both Rin and the cats.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあまあ、鈴もおまえたちも冷静になろうよ、私情はこのさい捨てて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There, there, you guys and you too Rin, calm down, set aside your personal feelings this time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There, there, you guys and you too Rin, calm down, set aside your personal feelings this time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しかしだな、理樹」
`鈴@「冷静になるほど、混乱するぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The more I calm down, the more confused I become...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The more I calm down, the more confused I become...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だってだぞ…」
`鈴@「その相手は運動も勉強もできて、人望もあると言ったじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Didn't he say that person's good at both school and sports, and popular too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Didn't he say that person's good at both school and sports, and popular too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、そうだね」
`鈴@「あたしの知ってる笹瀬川佐々美はそんな奴じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's nothing like the Sasami Sasasegawa I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's nothing like the Sasami Sasasegawa I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「周りについている人間も、人望じゃなくて、単に長いものに巻かれたいだけの取り巻きじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's not like she's popular, she's simply got a lot of minions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's not like she's popular, she's simply got a lot of minions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、だとしてもだよ、ここは彼の夢を壊さないであげようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, even if that's really true, let's not crush his dream.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, even if that's really true, let's not crush his dream.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今回の問題はそこじゃないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not our task this time, is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not our task this time, is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーむ、そうだな…」
`鈴@「わかった…」
`鈴@「おまえたち、もういいぞ、散れ」
猫たちは三々五々散っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: The cats scattered in groups of three and five.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cats scattered in groups of three and five.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「猫使いだね…」
鈴は不安げに立ちつくす相川くんの前に舞い戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: We returned to Aikawa-kun who was standing glued to the spot.
MESSAGE.Translation: We returned to Aikawa-kun who was standing glued to the spot.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あのな、結構お似合いだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey, I think you suit each other pretty well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey, I think you suit each other pretty well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「え、ほんと!?」
`鈴@「なんか後ろにいつも何人かついてるじゃないか、そのひとりになれそうだ、おまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝She's always got a flock of people following behind her, you could become one of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝She's always got a flock of people following behind her, you could become one of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「それは友達止まりって意味じゃ…」
いや、実はもっとひどい。
MESSAGE.EN: No, it's actually much worse than that.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, it's actually much worse than that.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「実を言うと、知り合いなんだ」
`相川@「まああれだけのリアクションしてるんだから、そうなんだろうけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Well, I could already tell that from your reaction...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Well, I could already tell that from your reaction...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「仲を取り持ってやれると思う。だからがんばれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll fix you up with her. So, do your best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll fix you up with her. So, do your best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「えぇ？　ほんとにぃ…？」
半信半疑なのだろう。
`鈴@「うん、だからがんばれ」
`相川@「まあだったら…頑張ってみるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝Well, I'll give it all I've got then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝Well, I'll give it all I've got then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「がんばれ」
だが、鈴の目がぴかーんと光ると、相川くんは怯えたように頷くしかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But seeing her gleaming eyes, Aikawa-kun nodded as though frightened into submission.
MESSAGE.Translation: But seeing her gleaming eyes, Aikawa-kun nodded as though frightened into submission.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「具体的には？」
`鈴@「あたしが笹ぜがわざざ美と話をして、趣味とか理想の男を聞き出す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm going to talk to Zazami Sasazegawa and ask her about her type of guy and her hobbies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm going to talk to Zazami Sasazegawa and ask her about her type of guy and her hobbies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「その後、傾向と対策を練ろう。それでどうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝After that we'll work up a plan to counter her tastes. How's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝After that we'll work up a plan to counter her tastes. How's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「噛みまくろうが、訂正なしで突き進むんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't even care about your lisp...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't even care about your lisp...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `相川@「いいけど、僕の名前はぜったい出さないでよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝That sounds good, but don't bring up my name...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝That sounds good, but don't bring up my name...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちりん、と大きく頷いてみせた。
`理樹@「恋の仲介かあ…鈴、そんなことできるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mediating a love relationship... Rin, is this something you can do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mediating a love relationship... Rin, is this something you can do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やってみないことにはわからないな…」
`理樹@「だろうねぇ…」
`理樹@「しかし…相手があれだからねぇ…先行きが不安だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... You know how she is... I'm worried how things will work out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... You know how she is... I'm worried how things will work out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まあ、とにかくやってみよう」
鈴はそのまま男子寮を出ていこうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was about to leave the boys' dorm right away, bristling with determination.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was about to leave the boys' dorm right away, bristling with determination.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あぁっ、僕、女子寮に入れないことわかってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I can't go into the girls' dorm, you know that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I can't go into the girls' dorm, you know that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あ、そーか」
`理樹@「笹瀬川さんに会っても、僕がいないところで、話進めないでほしいんだけど…その心配だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want you talking with Sasasegawa-san when I'm not around, though... Because I'm worried.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want you talking with Sasasegawa-san when I'm not around, though... Because I'm worried.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「む、そーか」
ちょっと考えた後…
`鈴@「うん、わかった」
素直に頷いてくれた。
部屋に戻ろうとすると、その前にクドが立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We returned to my room, and found Kud standing before the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: We returned to my room, and found Kud standing before the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が後ろに隠れたのか、ちりんと音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard Rin's bell ring, so I suspected she had hidden behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard Rin's bell ring, so I suspected she had hidden behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何か用？」
自分の机に向かい、今日出たぶんの宿題をこなしていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat on my desk and began today's homework.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat on my desk and began today's homework.

MESSAGE.JP: なんかトレーニング中の真人のために、やっているようでちょっと嫌だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't really feel like doing it, thinking it was for Masato's sake who was in the middle of training...
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't really feel like doing it, thinking it was for Masato's sake who was in the middle of training...

MESSAGE.JP: その無駄な時間を真面目に勉強にも割いてくれたらなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: If only he'd set aside some of the time he spent on this foolish stuff to study diligently...
MESSAGE.Translation: If only he'd set aside some of the time he spent on this foolish stuff to study diligently...

MESSAGE.JP: 一度びしっと言ってやるべきかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I should try talking sense into him for once.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I should try talking sense into him for once.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は馬鹿なんかじゃない…筋肉馬鹿なだけだ！　筋肉を捨てたら馬鹿も治るよ！
MESSAGE.EN: Masato isn't an idiot... He's a muscle idiot! You leave the muscle part off and his idiocy will vanish along with it!
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato isn't an idiot... He's a muscle idiot! You leave the muscle part off and his idiocy will vanish along with it!

MESSAGE.JP: 僕もあほなこと考えてないで、効率よく進めよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to stop thinking about nonsense and study seriously...
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to stop thinking about nonsense and study seriously...

MESSAGE.JP: ノックがして僕は背伸びをした。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I heard a knock at the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I heard a knock at the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん」
真人じゃないのかな…。
立ち上がり、ドアを開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up and opened the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up and opened the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「直枝さ～んっ」
クドの元気な声。
`理樹@「ん、なに？」
`クド@「今日の授業大変でしたね」
`理樹@「なんか一部の人間だけに当たるのが偏っているよーな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It does seem a bit biased when a certain someone is always called on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It does seem a bit biased when a certain someone is always called on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「でも賽の目ですからしょうがないです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But it's the roll of the dice, it can't be helped...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But it's the roll of the dice, it can't be helped...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「授業中にサイコロを振る教師というのはどうなんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think it's worrisome enough if a teacher's rolling dice in class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think it's worrisome enough if a teacher's rolling dice in class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「『彼は賽を振らない』なんて嘘かもしれませんねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Maybe it's a lie that ❛God doesn't play dice.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Maybe it's a lie that ❛God doesn't play dice.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはともかく、何の用？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That aside, was there something you wanted?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That aside, was there something you wanted?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、はい」
クドは、ぽん、と両手を合わせて言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She clasped her hands together and told me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clasped her hands together and told me.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ルームメイトさんも決まったことですし、本格的に荷物の整理をしようかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My roommate's been decided, we're busy sorting her things now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My roommate's been decided, we're busy sorting her things now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あぁ、そっか。今週末が相方の引っ越しだったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see. She's moving in this weekend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see. She's moving in this weekend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「寮長さんが余っている家具を用意してくれるそうなので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The dorm head is going to provide us some extra furniture, it seems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The dorm head is going to provide us some extra furniture, it seems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「据え付けのモノ以外に？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But your room's already furnished, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But your room's already furnished, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうです。なんでも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. But she says she's going to give us some extra things made by...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. But she says she's going to give us some extra things made by...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはほっぺたに指をついて、んー、と思い返す仕草をした。
MESSAGE.EN: She placed a finger on her cheek, trying to remember something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She placed a finger on her cheek, trying to remember something.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…なんでも、家具部の作品だそうです」
そんな部活動がうちにはあるのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd never heard of that club...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd never heard of that club...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「一つ前の三年生の先輩が卒業されてからは廃部されちゃったようですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I heard the club closed down last year after the last seniors graduated.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I heard the club closed down last year after the last seniors graduated.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「使えるモノは許可さえあれば使えるらしいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But we can freely use their work as long as we have permission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But we can freely use their work as long as we have permission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へぇ。それは初めて知ったよ。僕もいいのがあるかどうか探してみようかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's good to know. I think I should look for something for me, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's good to know. I think I should look for something for me, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「というわけで、お手伝いをお願いしたいのですが…どうでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, I'd like you to help, but... Is that okay with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, I'd like you to help, but... Is that okay with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは前で両手を組んで上目遣いに見上げてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She clasped her hands and looked up at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clasped her hands and looked up at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、いいよ」
`クド@「本当ですか！　ありがとうございます」
クドは小さくぴょん、と飛び上がって喜んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She jumped a little in delight.
MESSAGE.Translation: She jumped a little in delight.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええと、これからすぐ女子寮の前でいい？　待ち合わせ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... How about we meet right afterward in front of the girls' dorm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... How about we meet right afterward in front of the girls' dorm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、それでおっけーです」
クドはそこでふと気がついたように、
`クド@「うぃるゆーへるぷみ～？」
相変わらず棒読みだ。
僕は微苦笑しながら答えた。
`理樹@「…やー。おけー」
`クド@「さんくすおーる」
そしてぺこんとお辞儀をするクドなのだった。
荷物整理がまだ残っているということで、そっちを先に片付けるべくクドの部屋に来ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were still some things to arrange in Kud's room, so in order to clean it up we headed to her room.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were still some things to arrange in Kud's room, so in order to clean it up we headed to her room.

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋に備え付けのベッドには女の子らしい柄の掛け布団。
MESSAGE.EN: In the room was a standard bed, complete with a bed quilt of a girly design.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the room was a standard bed, complete with a bed quilt of a girly design.

MESSAGE.JP: 机の上には本や小物が積み上がっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were various books and other small things piled atop the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were various books and other small things piled atop the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 前来たときは薄クリーム色の壁だけだったのに、カレンダーなどが掛かっている。
MESSAGE.EN: The last time I was here, there was just a blank cream-colored wall, but this time a calendar and other things were hanging on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The last time I was here, there was just a blank cream-colored wall, but this time a calendar and other things were hanging on it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これはなに？」
青と白の格子模様で、ポケットみたいになっている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was something that resembled a checkered pocket of blue and white colors.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was something that resembled a checkered pocket of blue and white colors.

MESSAGE.JP: よくみたら、一枚の布ではない。
MESSAGE.EN: On closer inspection, it wasn't really a single cloth.
MESSAGE.Translation: On closer inspection, it wasn't really a single cloth.

MESSAGE.JP: 青っぽいのと白っぽい布をたくさん縫い合わせているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Blue and white patches were sewn together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Blue and white patches were sewn together.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「パッチワークですよ、直枝さん」
`クド@「私が自分で作ったんですけど。何か変でしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I made it myself. Is it weird...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I made it myself. Is it weird...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうなんだ。なるほど。別に変じゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I see. There's nothing weird about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I see. There's nothing weird about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋の隅には段ボール箱が空のまま積み重なっている。
MESSAGE.EN: There were empty cardboard boxes piled up in the corner.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were empty cardboard boxes piled up in the corner.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「段ボール、つぶしちゃうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll crush the cardboard boxes for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll crush the cardboard boxes for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、お願いします」
段ボール箱の底テープをはがし、つぶしていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I was ripping the duct tape from the cardboard boxes and crushing them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was ripping the duct tape from the cardboard boxes and crushing them.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、この箱は開けないの？」
段ボール箱の中に、ひとつだけ封を開けていないものがある。
MESSAGE.EN: Among all boxes there was one that wouldn't open.
MESSAGE.Translation: Among all boxes there was one that wouldn't open.

MESSAGE.JP: 灰色のそれは、粘着テープが貼られたままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The sticky tape on the gray colored box didn't seem to want to come off.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sticky tape on the gray colored box didn't seem to want to come off.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「え、あ、それは、…えーと？」
クドは首をかしげた。
`クド@「…その箱は…」
`理樹@「…どうかしたの？」
`クド@「…いえ、なんでもないですっ」
クドは首を振った。
`クド@「それは開けなくて構いませんです…多分」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's okay not to open it... I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's okay not to open it... I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだ。じゃあええと、机の下に入れておくね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. I'll put it under the desk then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. I'll put it under the desk then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、ありがとうございます」
`理樹@「そういえばさ、クド、家具は今日見に行くの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Speaking of which, are we going to go see the furniture today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Speaking of which, are we going to go see the furniture today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 尋ねながら箱つぶしを再開する。
MESSAGE.EN: I confirmed and resumed crushing the boxes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I confirmed and resumed crushing the boxes.

MESSAGE.JP: 箱には新聞紙が緩衝材代わりになっていたので、それも取り除きながらの作業だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I also took newspapers out of the boxes, which had served as packing material.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also took newspapers out of the boxes, which had served as packing material.

MESSAGE.JP: 使われていた新聞は英字新聞のようだ。
`クド@「明日にしようかと思ってます…段ボールも捨てなくてはいけないのを忘れてました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think we should do it tomorrow... I'd forgotten we had to throw the boxes away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think we should do it tomorrow... I'd forgotten we had to throw the boxes away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「直枝さんのご都合、悪いですか？」
`理樹@「いや、大丈夫だよ」
英字新聞紙をくしゃくしゃと丸める。
ちょうど一面記事の上のほうの見出しに目が止った。
MESSAGE.EN: An article on the cover caught my eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: An article on the cover caught my eye.

MESSAGE.JP: 『ノヴァヤテヴィーマテヌワ』
ローマ字読みをなんとかしてみても意味がわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I somehow managed to read the Latin characters, but the meaning remained a mystery.
MESSAGE.Translation: I somehow managed to read the Latin characters, but the meaning remained a mystery.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「直枝さん、ちょっと手伝ってください」
`理樹@「あ、うん」
僕はつぶし終わった箱の隣のゴミ箱に丸めた新聞紙を投げ入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was finished with crushing the boxes and tossed them together with the newspapers in the garbage can.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was finished with crushing the boxes and tossed them together with the newspapers in the garbage can.

MESSAGE.JP: クドが何かタペストリーみたいなものを広げようとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was unfolding something that resembled a tapestry.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was unfolding something that resembled a tapestry.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それ、なに？」
`クド@「えーと。わふー」
`理樹@「…？　うわ」
くるくると丸まったそれを広げてみると。
`理樹@「なんで$K19浮世絵$K0…」
`クド@「これを貼れとかおじい様言ってましたが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My grandfather told me to hang it somewhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My grandfather told me to hang it somewhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「これはですねぇ、清長さん作です」
`クド@「こんな女性になれとの願いを込めていただいたのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝He wishes me to become like the lady in the picture.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝He wishes me to become like the lady in the picture.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私には無理そうです」
クドは自分の髪の毛を触りながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said while fiddling with her hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said while fiddling with her hair.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それはそれとしても、意匠としてはこのかんざしが綺麗だと思うです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That aside, I think her hairpin has a very pretty design.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That aside, I think her hairpin has a very pretty design.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それに、このひと、夜中動きますし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And also, this person moves around during the night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And also, this person moves around during the night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「嘘っ。動くの!?」
`クド@「そうですよーこうきょろきょろーって目が動きます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, her eyes look around like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, her eyes look around like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんな馬鹿な」
`クド@「時々このひととですねぇ、あっちむいてほいー、とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And sometimes you know, she looks over this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And sometimes you know, she looks over this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇ!?」
`クド@「ちなみに夜中に目が覚めたときしか動かないのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝By the way, her eyes only move when I wake up in the middle of the night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝By the way, her eyes only move when I wake up in the middle of the night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わんだふぉー・じゃぱん」
`理樹@「それは単に寝ぼけているだけだと思うよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aren't you seeing things because you're half asleep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aren't you seeing things because you're half asleep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、貼るの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, where do you want to hang it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, where do you want to hang it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ルームメイトさんの意見を聞いた方がいいかなと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think I should ask my roommate's opinion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think I should ask my roommate's opinion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね…とりあえずしまっておこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right... Let's set it aside for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right... Let's set it aside for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、そうします」
`理樹@「えーと、これはなに？」
なんか木で出来た小さな台のよーな…かまぼこのよーな…
MESSAGE.EN: It was like a small wooden table... somewhat cylindrical.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like a small wooden table... somewhat cylindrical.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、それ枕です」
`理樹@「まくらー!?」
`クド@「おじい様愛用の枕…だったらしいのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was grandfather's favorite pillow... it seems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was grandfather's favorite pillow... it seems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「首が疲れます」
`理樹@「ダメじゃないか…」
`クド@「ですから枕も買いに行きたいところです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's why I want to go buy a new pillow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's why I want to go buy a new pillow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「家ではずっとそれだったの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Were you always using this pillow back home?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Were you always using this pillow back home?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「おじい様が来たときだけは、ですけど」
クドは真顔だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered with a serious look.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered with a serious look.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そうなんだ…って、それは何？　習字セット？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see... Huh, what's that? A calligraphy set?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see... Huh, what's that? A calligraphy set?❞

MESSAGE.JP: おまけに馬鹿でかい墨汁の容器が何本も。
MESSAGE.EN: To top it all off, it came with a number of stupidly huge ink bottles as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: To top it all off, it came with a number of stupidly huge ink bottles as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、これはハクテンのしっぽの毛で出来た筆なんですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, this is a pen made from the hair of an ermine's tail.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, this is a pen made from the hair of an ermine's tail.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「色々揃ってるけどクド、書道やるの？」
`クド@「少しだけ、ですけど」
`クド@「おじい様がノートはコレで書きなさいと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My grandfather told me to take notes in class with that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My grandfather told me to take notes in class with that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「無理、それ絶対無理」
`クド@「ですよね。なのでこれは机の中にしまっておきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You're right. I still keep it on my desk though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You're right. I still keep it on my desk though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は文鎮やら硯やらを見ながらその取り合わせにうなった。
MESSAGE.EN: I groaned looking at the set: paperweight, ink stone and everything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I groaned looking at the set: paperweight, ink stone and everything else.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん」
`クド@「…やっぱり、オカシイですか？」
クドが呟く。
`理樹@「あ、いや、そういう意味じゃないよ…そういう意味じゃなくって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I meant... That's not what I meant, it's just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I meant... That's not what I meant, it's just...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まるで日本ごひいきの、と言った形容詞そのままじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyone who buys that kind of stuff must be crazy about Japan.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyone who buys that kind of stuff must be crazy about Japan.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、クドのおじいさんにとってはそうなのかもしれないが。
MESSAGE.EN: So I've just come to realize how much Kud's grandfather loved Japan.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I've just come to realize how much Kud's grandfather loved Japan.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お部屋にこういうのがあると、何か勘違いしてる外国のひとー、みたいですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝With all these things in the room, it's like the room of some foreigner who's got the wrong idea, isn't it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝With all these things in the room, it's like the room of some foreigner who's got the wrong idea, isn't it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私も嫌いではないですし、むしろ好きなほうなんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't hate it, actually I rather like it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't hate it, actually I rather like it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは綺麗な飴色の櫛をためすがえす見ながら続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She went on while intensely examining a pretty amber-colored comb.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went on while intensely examining a pretty amber-colored comb.

MESSAGE.JP: その櫛を見るクドの横顔は無表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her face was expressionless as she stared at the comb.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her face was expressionless as she stared at the comb.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「外見がこんなですからおかしいですよね、やっぱり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This is how I look after all, it must seem weird.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This is how I look after all, it must seem weird.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドの台詞には何の感情も含まれていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no emotion in her words.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no emotion in her words.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとだけ下を向いてしょんぼりしているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She just seemed a little heartbroken, looking downward.
MESSAGE.Translation: She just seemed a little heartbroken, looking downward.

MESSAGE.JP: だからこそ、僕は一瞬言葉に詰まった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I wasn't sure how to answer right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I wasn't sure how to answer right away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんなことないよ。クドは、クドだし」
中身は僕たちと同じ国のひとみたいで。
MESSAGE.EN: She's a citizen of the same country as we are, on the inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's a citizen of the same country as we are, on the inside.

MESSAGE.JP: でも外見はまったく違っていて。
それでもその『違い』をクドがどう感じているか、は僕にはまだうかがい知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: But how she herself felt about that ❛difference,❜ I had no way of knowing.
MESSAGE.Translation: But how she herself felt about that ❛difference,❜ I had no way of knowing.

MESSAGE.JP: クドは僕の言葉に顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She raised her head hearing my words.
MESSAGE.Translation: She raised her head hearing my words.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ありがとうございます、直枝さん」
いつものクドの笑顔だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was her usual smiling face.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was her usual smiling face.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の当たり障りのない言葉で、その笑顔が引き出せたのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Did my bland words manage to bring out her smile again?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did my bland words manage to bring out her smile again?

MESSAGE.JP: いや、そうじゃない…そんなわけはない。
MESSAGE.EN: No, that's not it... That can't be right.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, that's not it... That can't be right.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな気持ちが僕にはなぜか残ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason that feeling lingered within me.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason that feeling lingered within me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、いいよ」
`クド@「本当ですか！　ありがとうございます」
クドは小さくぴょん、と飛び上がって喜んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She jumped a little in delight.
MESSAGE.Translation: She jumped a little in delight.

MESSAGE.JP: 袖を引っ張られる。
`鈴@「手伝うのか？」
`理樹@「え、うん」
…悩んでるみたいだ。
`クド@「どうなさいましたか？」
`理樹@「あー、うん」
`クド@「あ、鈴さんもご一緒だったのですね。こんばんはです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Rin-san, you're here too. Good evening.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Rin-san, you're here too. Good evening.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…こんばんわ」
背後からひょっこり顔を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She poked her head out from behind my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She poked her head out from behind my back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴も手伝うよね？」
`クド@「鈴さんも手伝ってくれるなら、とても助かりますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It'd be wonderful if Rin-san helped too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It'd be wonderful if Rin-san helped too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…こ、こんばん…わ」
相変らずギクシャクしていたが、挨拶は出来たらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She struggled as usual, but she at least managed to say hello.
MESSAGE.Translation: She struggled as usual, but she at least managed to say hello.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴も手伝う？」
`鈴@「なにっ」
`クド@「鈴さんも手伝ってくれるなら、とても助かりますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It'd be wonderful if Rin-san helped too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It'd be wonderful if Rin-san helped too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まだ悩んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked worried about something again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked worried about something again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、無理しないでいいよ、鈴は」
`鈴@「ごめんっ」
一言謝って、立ち去ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: She apologized with one word and left.
MESSAGE.Translation: She apologized with one word and left.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わふー…行ってしまったのです…」
`理樹@「人見知りだから、しょうがないんだ」
`理樹@「とりあえず僕は手伝うからさ」
`クド@「そうですかー…」
やがて、ちりん、と音を立てて、鈴が頷いた。
`クド@「はいっ、ありがとうございますっ」
`理樹@「ええと、これからすぐ女子寮の前でいい？　待ち合わせ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... How about we meet right afterward in front of the girls' dorm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... How about we meet right afterward in front of the girls' dorm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、それでおっけーです」
クドはそこでふと気がついたように、
`クド@「うぃるゆーへるぷみ～？」
相変わらず棒読みだ。
僕は微苦笑しながら答えた。
`理樹@「…やー。おけー」
`クド@「さんくすおーる」
そしてぺこんとお辞儀をするクドなのだった。
クドが女子寮に戻っていくと。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud returned to the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud returned to the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 脱力したように、僕の腕にもたれかかってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: She leaned on my arm, as though she was exhausted.
MESSAGE.Translation: She leaned on my arm, as though she was exhausted.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「がんばったね」
`鈴@「がんばるのはこれからだ…」
…まあ、本当はそうなんだけど。
荷物整理がまだ残っているということで、そっちを先に片付けるべくクドの部屋に来ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were still some things to arrange in Kud's room, so in order to clean it up we headed to her room.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were still some things to arrange in Kud's room, so in order to clean it up we headed to her room.

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋に備え付けのベッドには女の子らしい柄の掛け布団。
MESSAGE.EN: In the room was a standard bed, complete with a bed quilt of a girly design.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the room was a standard bed, complete with a bed quilt of a girly design.

MESSAGE.JP: 机の上には本や小物が積み上がっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There were various books and other small things piled up atop the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were various books and other small things piled up atop the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 前来たときは薄クリーム色の壁だけだったのに、カレンダーなどが掛かっている。
MESSAGE.EN: The last time I was here, there was just a blank cream-colored wall, but this time a calendar and other things were hanging on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The last time I was here, there was just a blank cream-colored wall, but this time a calendar and other things were hanging on it.

MESSAGE.JP: 物珍しそうに、鈴が辺りの小物を眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was looking at different things in the room with curiosity.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was looking at different things in the room with curiosity.

MESSAGE.JP: …確かに、クドの部屋には妙なものがいっぱいある。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Indeed, there were a lot of strange items in Kud's room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Indeed, there were a lot of strange items in Kud's room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これはなに？」
青と白の格子模様で、ポケットみたいになっている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was something that resembled a checkered pocket of blue and white colors.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was something that resembled a checkered pocket of blue and white colors.

MESSAGE.JP: よくみたら、一枚の布ではない。
MESSAGE.EN: On closer inspection, it wasn't really a single cloth.
MESSAGE.Translation: On closer inspection, it wasn't really a single cloth.

MESSAGE.JP: 青っぽいのと白っぽい布をたくさん縫い合わせているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Blue and white patches were sewn together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Blue and white patches were sewn together.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「パッチワークですよ、直枝さん」
`クド@「私が自分で作ったんですけど。何か変でしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I made it myself. Is it weird...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I made it myself. Is it weird...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうなんだ。なるほど。別に変じゃないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I see. There's nothing weird about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I see. There's nothing weird about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋の隅には段ボール箱が空のまま積み重なっている。
MESSAGE.EN: There were empty cardboard boxes piled up in the corner.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were empty cardboard boxes piled up in the corner.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「段ボール、つぶしちゃうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll crush the cardboard boxes for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll crush the cardboard boxes for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、お願いします」
段ボール箱の底テープをはがし、つぶしていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I was ripping the duct tape from the cardboard boxes and crushing them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was ripping the duct tape from the cardboard boxes and crushing them.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、これはどうすればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, what should I do with this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, what should I do with this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 段ボール箱の中に、ひとつだけ封を開けていないものがある。
MESSAGE.EN: Amongst all the boxes there was one that wouldn't open.
MESSAGE.Translation: Amongst all the boxes there was one that wouldn't open.

MESSAGE.JP: 灰色のそれは、粘着テープが貼られたままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The sticky tape on the gray colored box didn't seem to want to come off.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sticky tape on the gray colored box didn't seem to want to come off.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「え、あ、それは、…えーと？」
クドは首をかしげた。
`クド@「…その箱は…」
`理樹@「…どうかしたの？」
`クド@「…いえ、なんでもないですっ」
クドは首を振った。
`クド@「それは開けなくて構いませんです…多分」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's okay not to open it... I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's okay not to open it... I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだ。じゃあええと、机の下に入れておくね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. I'll put it under the desk then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. I'll put it under the desk then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、ありがとうございます」
尋ねながら箱つぶしを再開する。
MESSAGE.EN: I confirmed and resumed crushing the boxes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I confirmed and resumed crushing the boxes.

MESSAGE.JP: 箱には新聞紙が緩衝材代わりになっていたので、それも取り除きながらの作業だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I also took newspapers out of the boxes, which had served as packing material.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also took newspapers out of the boxes, which had served as packing material.

MESSAGE.JP: 使われていた新聞は英字新聞のようだ。
鈴が真面目な顔をしてその新聞を眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking at the newspaper with a serious look.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking at the newspaper with a serious look.

MESSAGE.JP: …珍しいらしい。
`クド@「鈴さんは読めるのですか？」
鈴は逃げるわけにも行かず、ただ固まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: She couldn't possibly run away, so she just kept standing there firmly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She couldn't possibly run away, so she just kept standing there firmly.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「すごいのです。私には全然わかりませんから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's amazing. I don't understand them at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's amazing. I don't understand them at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鈴さんを尊敬してしまいますっ」
…勘違いしたままクドが話を進め、鈴は硬直したまま、たまにあうあうと口を動かすだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Having gotten the wrong impression Kud kept on talking, and the stiffened Rin was just opening and closing her mouth without saying a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Having gotten the wrong impression Kud kept on talking, and the stiffened Rin was just opening and closing her mouth without saying a word.

MESSAGE.JP: 前に一度クドと一緒になった時も、こんな調子だったんだろうなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: The last time she was with Kud, she also ended up in a similar condition.
MESSAGE.Translation: The last time she was with Kud, she also ended up in a similar condition.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえばさ、クド、家具は今日見に行くの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Speaking of which, are we going to go see the furniture today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Speaking of which, are we going to go see the furniture today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 助け舟に話題を変えることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I came to Rin's rescue by changing the topic.
MESSAGE.Translation: I came to Rin's rescue by changing the topic.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「明日にしようかと思ってます…段ボールも捨てなくてはいけないのを忘れてました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think we should do it tomorrow... I'd forgotten we had to throw the boxes away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think we should do it tomorrow... I'd forgotten we had to throw the boxes away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「直枝さんのご都合、悪いですか？」
`理樹@「いや、大丈夫だよ」
英字新聞紙をくしゃくしゃと丸める。
ちょうど一面記事の上のほうの見出しに目が止った。
MESSAGE.EN: An article on the cover caught my eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: An article on the cover caught my eye.

MESSAGE.JP: 『ノヴァヤテヴィーマテヌワ』
ローマ字読みをなんとかしてみても意味がわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I somehow managed to read the Latin characters, but the meaning remained a mystery.
MESSAGE.Translation: I somehow managed to read the Latin characters, but the meaning remained a mystery.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、お二人とも、ちょっと手伝ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You two, please lend me a hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You two, please lend me a hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
僕はつぶし終わった箱の隣のゴミ箱に丸めた新聞紙を投げ入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was finished with crushing the boxes and tossed them together with the newspapers in the garbage can.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was finished with crushing the boxes and tossed them together with the newspapers in the garbage can.

MESSAGE.JP: クドが何かタペストリーみたいなものを広げようとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was unfolding something that resembled a tapestry.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was unfolding something that resembled a tapestry.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それ、なに？」
`クド@「えーと。わふー」
`理樹@「…？　うわ」
くるくると丸まったそれを広げてみると。
MESSAGE.EN: When I opened the scroll it unfolded, rolling round and round for a long time.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I opened the scroll it unfolded, rolling round and round for a long time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんで浮世絵…」
`鈴@「カッコいい…」
`理樹@「え、そうなの？」
…よくわからないところに鈴が食いついていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I'm not sure why it caught her interest.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I'm not sure why it caught her interest.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「これを貼れとかおじい様言ってましたが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My grandfather told me to hang it somewhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My grandfather told me to hang it somewhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「これはですねぇ、清長さん作です」
`クド@「こんな女性になれとの願いを込めていただいたのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝He wishes me to become like the lady in the picture.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝He wishes me to become like the lady in the picture.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私には無理そうです」
クドは自分の髪の毛を触りながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said while fiddling with her hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said while fiddling with her hair.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鈴さんならなれるかもしれませんね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But for Rin-san, it might be possible～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But for Rin-san, it might be possible～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …夢想を始める。
`鈴@「…カッコいいな」
`クド@「はいっ、とてもすたいりっしゅでカッコいいですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, this is very stylish and cool.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, this is very stylish and cool.❞

MESSAGE.JP: また照れ出した。
`クド@「それはそれとしても、意匠としてはこのかんざしが綺麗だと思うです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That aside, I think her hairpin has a very pretty design.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That aside, I think her hairpin has a very pretty design.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それに、このひと、夜中動きますし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And also, this person moves around during the night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And also, this person moves around during the night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「嘘っ。動くの!?」
`クド@「そうですよーこうきょろきょろーって目が動きます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, her eyes look around like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, her eyes look around like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんな馬鹿な」
`クド@「時々このひととですねぇ、あっちむいてほいー、とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And sometimes you know, she looks over this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And sometimes you know, she looks over this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇ!?」
`クド@「ちなみに夜中に目が覚めたときしか動かないのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝By the way, her eyes only move when I wake up in the middle of the night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝By the way, her eyes only move when I wake up in the middle of the night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わんだふぉー・じゃぱん」
`理樹@「それは単に寝ぼけているだけだと思うよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aren't you seeing things because you're half asleep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aren't you seeing things because you're half asleep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…あれ」
…ものすごい勢いで鈴が部屋の隅に逃げ出していた。
そういえば、怖いのは嫌いだったなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right, she doesn't like scary stories.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right, she doesn't like scary stories.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鈴さん、どうなさいましたか？」
鈴が首を横に振り、ちりちりん、と音を立てた。
`理樹@「まあ、取って食われたりしないから大丈夫だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it won't munch on you at least, so don't worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it won't munch on you at least, so don't worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恐る恐る戻ってくる。
`理樹@「で、貼るの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, where do you want to hang it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, where do you want to hang it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ルームメイトさんの意見を聞いた方がいいかなと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think I should ask my roommate's opinion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think I should ask my roommate's opinion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね…とりあえずしまっておこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right... Let's set it aside for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right... Let's set it aside for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、そうします」
`理樹@「えーと、これはなに？」
なんか木で出来た小さな台のよーな…かまぼこのよーな…。
MESSAGE.EN: A small lump made from a tree... in the shape of a half circle...
MESSAGE.Translation: A small lump made from a tree... in the shape of a half circle...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、それ枕です」
`理樹@「まくらー!?」
`クド@「おじい様愛用の枕…だったらしいのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was my grandfather's favorite pillow... it seems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was my grandfather's favorite pillow... it seems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「首が疲れます」
`理樹@「ダメじゃないか…」
`クド@「ですから枕も買いに行きたいところです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's why I want to go buy a new pillow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's why I want to go buy a new pillow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「家ではずっとそれだったの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Were you always using this pillow back home?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Were you always using this pillow back home?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「おじい様が来たときだけは、ですけど」
クドは真顔だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered with a serious look.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered with a serious look.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そうなんだ…って、それは何？　習字セット？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see... Huh, what's that? A calligraphy set?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see... Huh, what's that? A calligraphy set?❞

MESSAGE.JP: おまけに馬鹿でかい墨汁の容器が何本も。
MESSAGE.EN: To top it all off, it came with a number of stupidly big ink bottles as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: To top it all off, it came with a number of stupidly big ink bottles as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、これはハクテンのしっぽの毛で出来た筆なんですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, this is a pen made from the hair of an ermine's tail.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, this is a pen made from the hair of an ermine's tail.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「色々揃ってるけどクド、書道やるの？」
`クド@「少しだけ、ですけど」
`クド@「おじい様がノートはコレで書きなさいと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My grandfather told me to take notes in class with that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My grandfather told me to take notes in class with that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「無理、それ絶対無理」
`クド@「ですよね。なのでこれは机の中にしまっておきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You're right. I still keep it on my desk though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You're right. I still keep it on my desk though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は文鎮やら硯やらを見ながらその取り合わせにうなった。
MESSAGE.EN: I groaned looking at the set: paperweight, ink stone and everything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I groaned looking at the set: paperweight, ink stone and everything else.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん」
`クド@「…やっぱり、オカシイですか？」
クドが呟く。
`理樹@「あ、いや、そういう意味じゃないよ…そういう意味じゃなくって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I meant... That's not what I meant, it's just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I meant... That's not what I meant, it's just...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まるで日本ごひいきの、と言った形容詞そのままじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyone who buys that kind of stuff must be crazy about Japan.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyone who buys that kind of stuff must be crazy about Japan.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、クドのおじいさんにとってはそうなのかもしれないが。
MESSAGE.EN: So I've just come to realize how much Kud's grandfather loved Japan.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I've just come to realize how much Kud's grandfather loved Japan.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「お部屋にこういうのがあると、何か勘違いしてる外国のひとー、みたいですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝With all these things in the room, it's like the room of some foreigner who's got the wrong idea, isn't it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝With all these things in the room, it's like the room of some foreigner who's got the wrong idea, isn't it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私も嫌いではないですし、むしろ好きなほうなんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't hate it, actually I rather like it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't hate it, actually I rather like it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは綺麗な飴色の櫛をためすがえす見ながら続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She went on while intensely examining a pretty amber-colored comb.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went on while intensely examining a pretty amber-colored comb.

MESSAGE.JP: その櫛を見るクドの横顔は無表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her face was expressionless as she stared at the comb.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her face was expressionless as she stared at the comb.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「外見がこんなですからおかしいですよね、やっぱり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This is how I look after all, it must seem weird.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This is how I look after all, it must seem weird.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドの台詞には何の感情も含まれていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no emotion in her words.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no emotion in her words.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとだけ下を向いてしょんぼりしているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She just seemed a little heartbroken, looking downward.
MESSAGE.Translation: She just seemed a little heartbroken, looking downward.

MESSAGE.JP: だからこそ、僕は一瞬言葉に詰まった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I wasn't sure how to answer right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I wasn't sure how to answer right away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんなことないよ。クドは、クドだし」
中身は僕たちと同じ国のひとみたいで。
MESSAGE.EN: She's a citizen of the same country as we are, on the inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's a citizen of the same country as we are, on the inside.

MESSAGE.JP: でも外見はまったく違っていて。
それでもその『違い』をクドがどう感じているか、は僕にはまだうかがい知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: But how she herself felt about that ❛difference❜, I had no way of knowing.
MESSAGE.Translation: But how she herself felt about that ❛difference❜, I had no way of knowing.

MESSAGE.JP: クドは僕の言葉に顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She raised her head hearing my words.
MESSAGE.Translation: She raised her head hearing my words.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ありがとうございます、直枝さん」
いつものクドの笑顔だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was her usual smiling face.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was her usual smiling face.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の当たり障りのない言葉で、その笑顔が引き出せたのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Did my bland words manage to bring out her smile again?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did my bland words manage to bring out her smile again?

MESSAGE.JP: いや、そうじゃない…そんなわけはない。
MESSAGE.EN: No, that's not it... That can't be right.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, that's not it... That can't be right.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことを考えていると。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I was thinking this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I was thinking this.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がクドの顔をじっと覗き込んでいた。
`クド@「はい、なんでしょう？」
`鈴@「…実はあたし、英語読めない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...To be honest, I can't read English...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...To be honest, I can't read English...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …さっきの新聞の事だろう。気にしてたのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That must be about the newspaper from earlier. She was worried about it...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That must be about the newspaper from earlier. She was worried about it...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そ、そうだったのですかっ」
`クド@「それは、私の勘違いでご迷惑をおかけしてしまいましたっ」
`クド@「ごめんなさいです…」
`鈴@「い、いや…」
歯切れ悪く、頭を下げる。
`クド@「いえいえっ」
`鈴@「いやいや…」
…ふたりでぺこぺこと謝り合っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They were bowing repeatedly, apologizing to one another.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They were bowing repeatedly, apologizing to one another.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…違い、か）
微笑ましい光景を眺めながらも、なぜかさっきのクドとの会話が、妙に心に残ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even while looking at this charming scene, for some reason what Kud said earlier still lingered in my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even while looking at this charming scene, for some reason what Kud said earlier still lingered in my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっと、まだ宿題が終わってなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... I'm not done with my homework yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... I'm not done with my homework yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですか…」
一瞬残念そうな顔を見せたので、撤回しようとしたが…
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at her pitiful face made me want to take that back, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at her pitiful face made me want to take that back, but...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わかりました。お気になさらず宿題がんばってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I understand. Don't worry about me, go finish your homework.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I understand. Don't worry about me, go finish your homework.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 先にそう笑顔で言われ、こちらは曖昧に頷くしかできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered with a smile before I could say anything, so I could only nod vaguely in return.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered with a smile before I could say anything, so I could only nod vaguely in return.

MESSAGE.JP: 突然どんっと後ろから突かれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly someone poked me in the back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly someone poked me in the back.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴だ。
`理樹@「え、なに、鈴」
`鈴@「なんかかわいそーだ」
鈴にまで言われると、このままでいる自分がはがゆくなってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Since that was even coming from Rin, I obviously had to rethink my actions.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since that was even coming from Rin, I obviously had to rethink my actions.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、手伝うよっ」
立ち去ろうとしてたクドをそう呼び止める。
MESSAGE.EN: I called out to Kud who was already on her way out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called out to Kud who was already on her way out.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「え、いいのですか？」
`理樹@「うん、宿題なんて夜にできるしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I can do my homework later tonight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I can do my homework later tonight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その夜はまた恭介たちがやってくるんだろうなあ…と遠い目をしつつ。
MESSAGE.EN: Although Kyousuke and everyone else will come over in the evening...
MESSAGE.Translation: Although Kyousuke and everyone else will come over in the evening...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「本当ですか！　ありがとうございます」
クドは小さくぴょん、と飛び上がって喜んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She jumped a little in delight.
MESSAGE.Translation: She jumped a little in delight.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、鈴も手伝うって」
`鈴@「なにっ…そんな展開になるとは…」
`クド@「あ、鈴さんもご一緒だったのですね。こんばんはです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Rin-san, you're here as well. Good evening.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Rin-san, you're here as well. Good evening.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…こんばんわ」
背後からひょっこり顔を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She poked her head out from behind my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She poked her head out from behind my back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴も手伝う？」
`クド@「鈴さんも手伝ってくれるなら、とても助かりますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It'd be wonderful if Rin-san helped too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It'd be wonderful if Rin-san helped too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめんね」
`理樹@「じゃ、鈴、いこうか」
振り返るが、その姿はない。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around but she wasn't there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around but she wasn't there.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ？　鈴っ？」
返事もない。
僕がクドの相手をしている隙に逃げたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd run away while I was talking to Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd run away while I was talking to Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: ものすごい人見知りだ…。
こんなので生きていけるのかなあ、鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: How will she get through life like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: How will she get through life like this...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめんね」
クドは立ち去った。
`恭介@「よぅし、今夜も昨日の続きだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, we'll continue from last night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, we'll continue from last night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 夕飯を終えると、すぐ僕たちの部屋に集まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Right after dinner, everyone assembled in our room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right after dinner, everyone assembled in our room.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴だけは外で待機だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was the only one on standby outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was the only one on standby outside.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃーう。
`鈴@『おなかすいたか？』
鈴は猫と話しているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was talking to a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was talking to a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『よしよし、たくさん缶詰とってこような』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Alrighty then, I'll go fetch lots of canned food for you.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Alrighty then, I'll go fetch lots of canned food for you.]

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃまず校舎に潜入せよ」
`鈴@『了解』
鈴の挑戦は続く。
`鈴@『タイミングを覚えた』
`鈴@『それに、あいつの動きが遅くなってる。きっと疲れたんだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Also its movements slowed down. I'm sure it's tired.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Also its movements slowed down. I'm sure it's tired.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「怪我はない？」
`鈴@『かすり傷ていど……』
ぬおーん。
`鈴@『こら。隠れないとあぶないっていってるだろ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Hey, it's dangerous out in the open.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Hey, it's dangerous out in the open.]

MESSAGE.JP: ふいに声が止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was abruptly cut off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was abruptly cut off.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『きたっ』
声が遠くなる。たぶん構えてるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice grew distant. Maybe she was preparing herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice grew distant. Maybe she was preparing herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「待ってくれぇ！」
いきなり背後から声が聞こえて、僕たちは振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly a voice came from behind us, and we turned around to face it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly a voice came from behind us, and we turned around to face it.

MESSAGE.JP: そこには見慣れぬ白衣姿の男子生徒がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Standing there was a male student we'd never seen before, donning a white robe.
MESSAGE.Translation: Standing there was a male student we'd never seen before, donning a white robe.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…あ、逃げられた』
今の声を聞いて、最後の一撃を躊躇してしまったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like she had hesitated in landing the last blow because of the sudden voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like she had hesitated in landing the last blow because of the sudden voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえのせいで、逃がしただろーが！　誰だよ、おまえっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's your fault it got away! Who the hell are you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's your fault it got away! Who the hell are you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「確か…生物部の田中…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You must be... Tanaka from the biology club.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You must be... Tanaka from the biology club.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「またの名を…バイオ田中」
`恭介@「間違いないな？」
