`田中@「ああ、君の言う通りだ。そう呼ぶ奴もいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝Yes, it's just as you said. There are those who call me that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝Yes, it's just as you said. There are those who call me that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そのバイオ田中様がなんの用で？」
`田中@「あの子をもう謎の生命体と戦わせないでくれ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝Don't make her battle the mysterious lifeform anymore!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝Don't make her battle the mysterious lifeform anymore!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え？　どーして」
`田中@「その子が戦っているのは、僕のオオワシなんだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝What she's fighting is, in fact, my Steller's sea eagle!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝What she's fighting is, in fact, my Steller's sea eagle!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんなものがどうしてここにいるんだい。オオワシは天然記念物のはずだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's an animal like that doing here? It's supposed to be a protected species.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's an animal like that doing here? It's supposed to be a protected species.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「棗くん、覚えてないのかい」
`恭介@「もったいぶるなよ」
`田中@「じゃあ、ヒントをあげるよ」
`田中@「オオワシは北海道にいるんだよ」
`恭介@「北海道…」
`恭介@「ああっ！　あいつか!!」
`田中@「そうだよ、棗くん…きみが連れてきた、あのオオワシだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝That's right, Natsume-kun... It's the sea eagle you brought along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝That's right, Natsume-kun... It's the sea eagle you brought along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺がふらっと青函トンネル歩いて、北海道に旅してきた時に、ついてきたあのワシかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The one who followed me when I was walking aimlessly through the Seikan tunnel during my trip to Hokkaido...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The one who followed me when I was walking aimlessly through the Seikan tunnel during my trip to Hokkaido...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「その子が戦っているのは、僕のニホンカモシカなんだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝What she's fighting is in fact my Japanese serow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝What she's fighting is in fact my Japanese serow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんなものがどうしてここにいるんだい。ニホンカモシカは天然記念物のはずだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's an animal like that doing here? It's supposed to be a protected species.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's an animal like that doing here? It's supposed to be a protected species.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「棗くん、覚えてないのかい」
`恭介@「もったいぶるなよ」
`田中@「じゃあ、ヒントをあげるよ」
`田中@「ニホンカモシカは…新潟で天然記念物に指定されているんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝Japanese serows... are designated as a protected species in Niigata.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝Japanese serows... are designated as a protected species in Niigata.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「新潟…」
`恭介@「ああっ！　あいつか!!」
`田中@「そうだよ、棗くん…きみが連れてきた、あのニホンカモシカだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝That's right, Natsume-kun... It's the Japanese serow you brought along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝That's right, Natsume-kun... It's the Japanese serow you brought along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺がふらっと新潟に旅してきた時に、ついてきたあのシカかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The one that followed me during my trip to Niigata...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The one that followed me during my trip to Niigata...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「その子が戦っているのは、僕のツキノワグマなんだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝What she's fighting is in fact my Asian black bear!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝What she's fighting is in fact my Asian black bear!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ツキノワグマぁ!?　なんでそんなのが学校にいるんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Asian black bear!? What's that doing here at school?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Asian black bear!? What's that doing here at school?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「棗くん、覚えてないのかい」
`恭介@「もったいぶるなよ」
`田中@「じゃあ、ヒントをあげるよ」
`田中@「ツキノワグマは岩手の人里によく降りてくるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝Asian black bears often co-exist with humans in Iwate prefecture.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝Asian black bears often co-exist with humans in Iwate prefecture.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「岩手…」
`恭介@「ああっ！　あいつか!!」
`田中@「そうだよ、棗くん…きみが連れてきた、あのツキノワグマだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝That's right, Natsume-kun... That's the Asian black bear you brought along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝That's right, Natsume-kun... That's the Asian black bear you brought along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よく無事だったものだ…。
`恭介@「俺がふらっと岩手に旅してきた時に、ついてきたあのクマかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is that the bear that followed me during my trip to Iwake...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is that the bear that followed me during my trip to Iwake...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「そう。きみに懐いてどうしようもなかったのを、我々生物部が是非にと預からせて頂いたものだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝Yes. It got so attached to you that it didn't know what to do, our biology club is presently taking care of him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝Yes. It got so attached to you that it didn't know what to do, our biology club is presently taking care of him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よく懐いたなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It must have really become attached to him...
MESSAGE.Translation: It must have really become attached to him...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうか、そうだったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see, so that's how it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see, so that's how it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そいつがどうして問題になるほど暴れ回っている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Why'd he go on a rampage, causing all that trouble?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Why'd he go on a rampage, causing all that trouble?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「それは…僕が開発した…バイオ田中のバイオクッキーを食べ続けていたせいだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝That's because... He kept on eating the ❛Bio Cookies❜ that I, Bio-Tanaka, developed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝That's because... He kept on eating the ❛Bio Cookies❜ that I, Bio-Tanaka, developed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだその、クッキーは」
`田中@「適応の高速高度化…つまり進化を促進する効果のあるクッキーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝They promote changes that improve adaptation... In other words, they are cookies that accelerate evolution.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝They promote changes that improve adaptation... In other words, they are cookies that accelerate evolution.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「気味の悪いものを…」
`恭介@「どうしたらあいつを助けられる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What can we do to save him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What can we do to save him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: バイオ田中はポケットから注射器を一本取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Bio-Tanaka took out a syringe from his pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: Bio-Tanaka took out a syringe from his pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「このアンチバイオクッキー液を注射すれば…治るはずだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝If you use this anti-biocookie serum... It should make him better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝If you use this anti-biocookie serum... It should make him better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「だが相手は凶暴だぞ。そして俊敏だ」
`田中@「う…それは…」
`恭介@「さっきみたいに弱らせるしかないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We must wear him down first, like we did before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We must wear him down first, like we did before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: バイオ田中は苦渋の決断を迫られ、言葉を失う。
MESSAGE.EN: Bio-Tanaka was at a loss for words, facing a difficult decision.
MESSAGE.Translation: Bio-Tanaka was at a loss for words, facing a difficult decision.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介だって、自分に懐いていた生き物ならそれは同じはずなのに、言葉は冷静だ。
MESSAGE.EN: We were talking about something that was fond of Kyousuke, so Kyousuke should be feeling the same way. He asked calmly.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were talking about something that was fond of Kyousuke, so Kyousuke should be feeling the same way. He asked calmly.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「明日もう一度…戦わせてもらうぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Tomorrow, one more time... Will you let us fight him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Tomorrow, one more time... Will you let us fight him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `田中@「やむをえまい…」
`田中@「あいつをどうか…よろしく頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tanaka@❝I beg you... do something about him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tanaka@❝I beg you... do something about him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ」
注射器が恭介に渡された。
MESSAGE.EN: He handed the syringe to Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: He handed the syringe to Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴っ、大丈夫かっ」
`鈴@『なんとか…おーばー…』
`恭介@「さて、表に鈴を待機させてるはいいが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's nice having Rin on standby outdoors, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's nice having Rin on standby outdoors, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「やることがない」
`理樹@「じゃ、中に入れてあげようよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's tell her to go inside then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's tell her to go inside then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんなに俺と戦わせたいのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Do you want to fight me that badly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Do you want to fight me that badly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いえいえ、そういう意味じゃないですから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, that's not what I meant...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, that's not what I meant...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、なんかは思いつくだろ」
にゃーう。
`鈴@『おなかすいたか？』
鈴は猫と話しているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was talking to a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was talking to a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『うーん、なんもないな…』
`鈴@『ん？　誰かきた』
`鈴@『笹瀬川佐々美っ！』
`真人@「またでやがった!!」
`佐々美@『今日はこんなところでどんな悪巧みをしてるのかしら？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[What kind of insidious plot are you scheming today in such a place?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[What kind of insidious plot are you scheming today in such a place?]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『悪だくみなんてしてない』
`佐々美@『じゃあ、寮にお戻りになったら』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Then, are you going back to the dormitory?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Then, are you going back to the dormitory?]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『そうだな』
`佐々美@『あ、ちょっとお待ちなさい』
呼び止められた。
`佐々美@『その…宮沢様が好きな食べ物を教えてくれないかしら？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Um... Can you tell me Miyazawa-sama's favorite meal?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Um... Can you tell me Miyazawa-sama's favorite meal?]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、人気者だなー」
`鈴@『あいつの好きな食べ物？』
`真人@「湯を捨てずに食べるカップ焼きそばと言え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tell her it's instant yakisoba without draining the hot water.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tell her it's instant yakisoba without draining the hot water.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『湯を捨てずに食べるカップ焼きそばだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Instant yakisoba without draining the hot water.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Instant yakisoba without draining the hot water.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『う…』
少し引いた！
`佐々美@『湯を捨てないところがエコロジーですわね…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Not draining off the hot water is ecological...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Not draining off the hot water is ecological...]

MESSAGE.JP: なんとか受け入れた！
`佐々美@『しかし湯にソースを混ぜて、どんな味がするのかしら…あなたもそれを食べたことがありまして？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[However, I wonder what sauce mixed with hot water would taste like... Have you ever tried it yourself?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[However, I wonder what sauce mixed with hot water would taste like... Have you ever tried it yourself?]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『食べてないし、そもそも真人の嘘だから作ってもいない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I haven't, and it's just something Masato made up, so he doesn't make it in the first place.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I haven't, and it's just something Masato made up, so he doesn't make it in the first place.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『く…またなのっ、わたくしを馬鹿にしてっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Guh... Are you making a fool out of me again?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Guh... Are you making a fool out of me again?]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『それは、わたくしへの挑戦状ですのね？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Are you daring me for a challenge with that?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Are you daring me for a challenge with that?]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『いいでしょう…今日こそはそのへらず口、叩けなくしてやりますわ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Very well... I shall shut that insolent mouth of yours again.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Very well... I shall shut that insolent mouth of yours again.]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『おまえたちっ、やっておしまいなさいっ』
びしっ！　ばしっ！　ばきっ！　どぐっ！
`理樹@「あーあ、また始まっちゃった…」
当然でしょ…。
`恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、もうわかってきたよ…」
`佐々美@「ようやく辿りつきましたのね、退屈してましたのよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You finally made it, weren't you bored?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You finally made it, weren't you bored?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「このわたくしが…４戦４敗…ありえないことですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝For me... to lose four battles out of four... is unthinkable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝For me... to lose four battles out of four... is unthinkable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「今度こそ地面に這いつくばらしてやりますわ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「今度は本気で参りますわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら意外にやりますのね」
`佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「こんな尻の青い下級生にすら勝てないなんて、話にもならないですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『ミッションコンプリート』
`理樹@「いやいや、してないしてない」
`鈴@「理樹、戦利品だ。やる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…ありがと」
`ソフト部員@「念願の打倒棗鈴をついに佐々美様が達成された！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Finally, Sasami-sama achieved the long-sought defeat of Rin Natsume!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Finally, Sasami-sama achieved the long-sought defeat of Rin Natsume!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふっふっふ…」
`佐々美@「って、念願とか、ついには余計ですわっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Wha-, don't say things like long-sought or finally!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Wha-, don't say things like long-sought or finally!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「これぐらいお手の物ですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This much is an easy task for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This much is an easy task for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部員@「はっ、お手の物でございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Ma'am, an easy task it was!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Ma'am, an easy task it was!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いきますわよっ」
`佐々美@「本気になれば、よっっゆーーっですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It's a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It's a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ざっとこんなものですわ」
`理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絶対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: そうして今夜も更けていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: And so the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

SELECT.JP: 鈴を探す$d放っておく$dさすらう
しばらく見守る$d声をかける
SELECT.EN: Watch for a while$dCall out to her
SELECT.Translation: Watch for a while$dCall out to her
